actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported in lieu of S.J.RES. 391 with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond with an amendment and an amendment to the title and an amended preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 904.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title and an amended preamble by Voice Vote.
The Secretary of the Senate was ordered to request the House of Representatives to return H.J.Res. 686 to the Senate.
House Agreed to Senate Request to Return H.J.Res.686 to the Senate.
Enrolled copy corrected and sent to House.
House Agreed to Senate Amendments by Unanimous Consent.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to designate August 12, 1986, as "National Civil Rights Day".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Designates August 12, 1987, as National Civil Rights Day.

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate August 12, 1986, as "National Civil Rights Day".
